import_yaml_error.title: The Mastodon YAML configuration import failed
import_yaml_error.description:
Configuring Mastodon using YAML is being removed but there was a connection error when trying to import the YAML configuration for `{client_id}`.

Please verify your app registration is correct and restart Home Assistant to try again or remove the Mastodon YAML configuration from your configuration.yaml file and continue to set up the integration manually.
